scripts.fetch: git submodule add --force https://github.com/dubisdev/todoist-rest-client-documentation repo && git submodule update --remote -f
scripts.send_gh: git add . && git commit -m "Updating docs" && git push
scripts.publicar: rm -r docs & rm -r repo & git add . & git commit -m "Removing old files" && yarn fetch && yarn build && yarn copy && yarn send_gh
